definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: bruise, wound by bruising (NH split, bruise; Ar. fas.a9a squeeze a ripe date, rub; Aram. [[פְּחַע]] split);—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf. [[הִכּוּנִי]] [[פְּחָעוּנִי]] Ct So 5:7; Inf. abs. [[הַכֵּה וּפָחׂעַ]] 1Ki 20:37 a smiting and a bruising (him); Pt. Pass. cstr. [[פְּחוּעַ־דַּכָּה]] De 23:2 one wounded by crushing.
